sentences.en: ...a successful businesswoman who runs her own international cosmetics company.
sentences.cn: …一个经营着自己的国际化妆品公司的成功的女商人。

sentences.en: A Chinese businesswoman became very rich recycling waste paper.
sentences.cn: 一名中国的女商人靠循环利用废纸发了财.

sentences.en: A: My boss is such a shrewd businesswoman that everyone admires her.
sentences.cn: 我的老板是个非常精明的生意人,每个人都很欣赏她.

sentences.en: Mary is a businesswoman. She is also a mother.
sentences.cn: 玛丽是一位女商人, 她也是一位母亲.

sentences.en: Mary is not a businesswoman. She is not a mother either.
sentences.cn: 玛丽既不是位女商人也不是位母亲.

sentences.en: My mother a businesswoman and my sister is in class 5.1.
sentences.cn: 我妈是个职业妇女,而我妹在五年一班.

sentences.en: Sandra Bullock plays a successful businesswoman in the romantic comedy The Proposal.
sentences.cn: 珊卓.布拉克在浪漫喜剧《爱情限时签》中饰演事业成功的女强人.
她是一位很成功的女实业家.

sentences.en: She is also a businesswoman and works with information technology.
sentences.cn: 同时她也是名商人,从事信息技术工作.

sentences.en: She soon settled into her new role as Businesswoman.
sentences.cn: 她很快就适应她职业妇女的角色了.

sentences.en: Successful and single businesswoman Kate Holbrook has long put her career ahead of a personal life.
sentences.cn: 成功的单身女商人凯特·霍尔布鲁克一直把她的事业摆在个人生活之前.

sentences.en: The president made a presentation to the businesswoman of the year.
sentences.cn: 总统为本年度最成功的女实业家颁发了奖品.

sentences.en: While she lives in Germany a businesswoman.
You're a businesswoman who's good at her job - bloody good; I can testify to that!
sentences.cn: 你是个精于此道的女生意人,精得很, 我能作证.
你天生就是做生意的料.

trans.tran_cn: 女商人，女实业家，（尤指）女经理，善于理财的女子
trans.tran_en: a woman who works in business
